amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a temporary windfall profit tax on crude oil and to use the proceeds of the tax collected to provide a nonrefundable tax credit of $100 for every personal exemption claimed for taxable years beginning in 2005.

action.text: Amendment SA 2635 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2635.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2635 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 65. Record Vote Number: 341.
Amendment SA 2635 ruled out of order by the chair.
